meta_description: California Automobile museum located in Sacramento, California.
hours_text:
# Visit the Museum

[Welcome to the California Automobile Museum!](https://www.calautomuseum.org/event-details/welcome-to-the-california-automobile-museum)

[Buy your Ticket!](https://www.calautomuseum.org/event-details/welcome-to-the-california-automobile-museum)

# Adults: $14, Seniors (65 & Over): $12, Veterans & Students: $12, Youth (6-17): $8, 5 & Under: Free  
  
Rain or shine - no refunds

# Visit us!

Let's take a ride through automotive history! We have 120+ cars on exhibit spanning nearly 120 years of history! Our collection strives to represent the entire history of the automobile from brass-era cars all the way to cars packed with the latest in tech! Come check it out!

​

Tickets can also be bought day of in person at our front desk.

​

We are open Wednesday through Monday from 10:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. with last admission at 4:00 p.m.

We are closed on Tuesdays, Easter Sunday, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's Day.

​

We close at 3 pm on Christmas Eve & New Year's Eve.

​

Service animals are welcome. We do not allow non-service animals.

​

We are participants in the [NARM](https://narmassociation.org/how-it-works/), [AMG](https://www.petersen.org/automotive-museum-group), [NAAM](https://naammuseums.org/reciprocal-admission-program/), and [ROAM](https://sites.google.com/site/roammuseums/home?authuser=0) reciprocal programs. Please visit the respective links to learn more about eligibility. 

​

CAM is proud to be part of the Museums For All program. Visit...
